thread.title: Son of 'Storage Wars Miami' star charged with murdering friend during viewing party
thread.title_full: Son of 'Storage Wars Miami' star charged with murdering friend during viewing party

title: Son of 'Storage Wars Miami' star charged with murdering friend during viewing party
text: Son of 'Storage Wars Miami' star charged with murdering friend during viewing party Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) The 23-year-old son of “Storage Wars: Miami” star Kevin Pew is currently being held in Broward County’s Main Jail after he allegedly shot and killed a female family friend during a “Storage Wars: Miami” viewing party at his father’s home on Oct. 13.
